attributes.action: To Create a Grouchy Nigel Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The signed below realise that a times everybody needs a day to relax and be able to take a light hearted approach to life, with this mind we petition for a national holiday called grouchy nigel day to care and share with other people.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
